commands.name: help
commands.help: show help message (for the specified command)
commands.description: shows a help message for the command CMD, if CMD is given and a valid subcommand. if CMD is not given, a general help text will be shown. trivia: for logical reasons, this help message is probably superflous.

arguments.help: the subcommand for which the help shall be displayed.
